remarks: A continuous function preserves filter limits.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement: flfcnp $p |- ( ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ L e. ( Fil ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) /\ ( A e. ( ( J fLimf L ) ` F ) /\ G e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` A ) ) ) -> ( G ` A ) e. ( ( K fLimf L ) ` ( G o. F ) ) ) $.
